scripts.all: tsc && node dist/scripts/get-repeaters.js && node dist/scripts/combine.js && node dist/scripts/group-by.js && node dist/scripts/make-chirp.js && node dist/scripts/make-yaesu.js
scripts.no-scrape: tsc && node dist/scripts/combine.js && node dist/scripts/group-by.js && node dist/scripts/make-chirp.js && node dist/scripts/make-yaesu.js
